title: Mørkøv and Cavendish’s Last Chance at History: From Botched Sprint to Reunion
content:
The 'Cavendish Express' now has its conductor with the arrival of Danish leadout ace: 'The day after he crashed in the Tour, my phone was ringing.'

Read the full article at Mørkøv and Cavendish’s Last Chance at History: From Botched Sprint to Reunion on Velo.
author: ahood
